page.title: 15Local News during 1985 Cl. 7
page.content: We have prioritised the responses to a survey of local news items: 1 The proposed N/S road linking M55 to Fleetwood 2 Staining Gala 3 The induction of our new Vicar 4 The proposed further housing and its effect on the character of the village 5 The work of the Dev. Assoc. in trying to provide playing areas in the village 6 The Parish Council Elections 7 Proposed boundary reorganisation 8 The Church May Queen Day 9 The extension of the caravan park 10 The restoration of Staining Mill 11 Important School Events 12 Continued efforts to improve road safety in the lanes and roads around the village. 13 The proposed site for travelling people on the boundary between the village and Blackpool.
